message.content: {"task_id":"equities_research_task_001","user_prompt":"Gather information about Apple Inc. (AAPL) including its current stock price, recent news, and company profile.","complexity":"simple","max_turns":3,"tools_available":["polygon_get_aggs","polygon_get_news","fmp_get_quote","fmp_get_company_profile","tavily_search"],"limits":{"max_tools":3,"max_servers":1},"tool_sequence":[{"step":1,"server":"fmp","tool":"fmp_get_quote","params":{"symbol":"AAPL"},"analysis_requirements":{"extract":["price","volume","changesPercentage"],"compute":[],"select":[],"accept_if":["price > 0"],"next_args_from":"price"}},{"step":2,"server":"polygon","tool":"polygon_get_news","params":{"ticker":"AAPL","limit":5},"analysis_requirements":{"extract":["data.results[][title]"],"compute":[],"select":[],"accept_if":["len(data.results) > 0"],"next_args_from":""}},{"step":3,"server":"fmp","tool":"fmp_get_company_profile","params":{"symbol":"AAPL"},"analysis_requirements":{"extract":["description","industry","sector"],"compute":[],"select":[],"accept_if":[],"next_args_from":""}}],"final_answer_requirements":{"format":"markdown","must_include":["current stock price","recent news","company description","industry","sector"],"grounded_from":["price","data.results[]","description","industry","sector"],"quality_criteria":["no hallucinations","concise"]},"judge_rubric":{"weights":{"coverage":0.4,"grounding":0.4,"clarity":0.2,"safety":0},"target_length_range":[50,150]}}
